title: Distributive Property
text: The distributive property states that the product of a factor times a sum is the sum of the factor times each term in the sum. $$a \left(b+c\right)=a b+a c$$
speech: The distributive property states that the product of a factor times a sum is the sum of the factor times each term in the sum.  a, parentheses b plus c,  is equal to, a b plus a c
pacedSpeech: The distributive property states that the product of a factor times a sum is the sum of the factor times each term in the sum.   a,  b plus c,  is equal to, a b plus a c

title: Distributive Property
text: Using the distributive property the equation can be re-arranged in the form $$2r-15+5r+4$$
speech: Using the distributive property the equation can be re-arranged in the form  2 r minus 15 plus 5 r plus 4
pacedSpeech: Using the distributive property the equation can be re-arranged in the form   2 r minus 15 plus 5 r plus 4

title: Commutative Property of Addition
text: The equation can be re-arranged in the form $$2r+5r-15+4$$
speech: The equation can be re-arranged in the form  2 r plus 5 r minus 15 plus 4
pacedSpeech: The equation can be re-arranged in the form   2 r plus 5 r minus 15 plus 4

title: Like Terms
speech: 2 r plus 5 r is equal to 7 r
pacedSpeech: 2 r plus 5 r is equal to 7 r

title: Like Terms
speech: minus 15 plus 4 is equal to negative 11
pacedSpeech: minus 15 plus 4 is equal to negative 11
